# modus-progress



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                          | Type     | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `backgroundColor` | `background-color` | (optional) The progress bar's background color.      | `string` | `'#FFFFFF'` |
| `color`           | `color`            | (optional) The progress bar's foreground color.      | `string` | `'#005F9E'` |
| `maxValue`        | `max-value`        | (optional) The progress bar's maximum value.         | `number` | `100`       |
| `minValue`        | `min-value`        | (optional) The progress bar's minimum value.         | `number` | `0`         |
| `percentageColor` | `percentage-color` | (optional) The progress bar's percentage text color. | `string` | `'#FFFFFF'` |
| `text`            | `text`             | (optional) The text displayed on the progress bar.   | `string` | `undefined` |
| `value`           | `value`            | (optional) The progress bar's value.                 | `number` | `0`         |
